name: Welcome To My Birthday Party
description:
Welcome To My Birthday Party. 

John Puleio

3D Game Design Project. 

Fall 2020.

The physics of this game are a little weird because I had trouble with setting up collisions. All 3D models in this game where made and textured by me. If I was to do anything else with the project, I would have rigged and animated the player model. I also would have liked to work on 3D modeling and texturing more.
